unnormalised: The average monthly data consumption per user in India is now estimated to be around 17 GB, a stark contrast from figures just five years ago. Analysts project further growth, especially with the expansion of 5G coverage to Tier 2 and Tier 3 cities. The recent spectrum auctions have paved the way for this expansion. Expect announcements regarding revised data plans in the coming weeks. One planned feature is a data boost of 500 MB for users purchasing plans worth Rs. 299 and above. This move will especially benefit those in areas where network density is relatively low (less than 500 sq ft per base station).
